title: Mean Reversion at Bands
objective: Fade extremes at Bollinger bands with oscillator confirmation.
entry_logic: (close <= bb_lower_20 AND rsi<30 AND stoch_rsi up) OR (close >= bb_upper_20 AND rsi>70 AND stoch_rsi down)
exit_logic: target: mid-band; stop: beyond band by ATR
caveats: Strong trends can overrun reversions; require oscillator turn.
beginner_summary: Fade band extremes only when RSI/StochRSI turn; take profits at mid-band.
assistant_hints: Avoid fighting strong trends; wait for oscillator turn.
Use mid-band as a first target to reduce whipsaw.
Do not enter on thinly traded names.
Confirm with volume context when possible.
